column4: Can someone here teach me how to install Windows Xp in Ubuntu? Like via VmWare or something.

Can someone here teach me how to install Windows Xp in Ubuntu? Like via VmWare or something.
there is a good reference on installing VMWare here: http://www.ubuntugeek.com/how-to-install-vmware-server-from-canonical-commercial-repository-in-ubuntu-feisty.html - that should get you started
